scheme_name: Educational Assistance to the 10th to 12th Students
description: The Educational Assistance to the 10th to 12th Students scheme in Maharashtra provides financial support to students in classes 10th to 12th to promote education among economically disadvantaged groups. The scheme aims to reduce dropout rates and encourage students to complete their secondary and higher secondary education.
key_features: Financial assistance for students in classes 10th to 12th
Covers educational expenses like fees and books

benefits.assistance_amount: Varies based on student needs and state guidelines
benefits.coverage: School fees, books, and other educational expenses

education_criteria: Must be studying in recognized schools in Maharashtra
additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Maharashtra
Annual family income must not exceed state-specified limit (typically Rs. 2.5 Lakhs)
institution_criteria: Government or recognized private schools in Maharashtra

eligible_courses_delhi: Higher secondary education (Classes 11-12, Science, Commerce, Arts)

steps: Visit the Maharashtra scholarship portal or school office
Fill out the application form for educational assistance
Verification by school or state authorities
application_process.note: Check with school or portal for application deadlines

required_documents.note: To prove family income below state-specified limit

special_notes: Assistance amount varies based on state budget and student needs
Renewal requires proof of continued enrollment and academic progress
Limited to students in recognized Maharashtra schools
